name: rjweb-server
description: Easy and Robust Way to create a Web Server with Many Easy-to-use Features in NodeJS

scripts.build: rm -rf lib && tsc && typia generate --input=src --output=lib/transformed && esbuild `find lib/transformed -type f -name "*.ts"` --platform='node' --ignore-annotations --format='cjs' --outdir='lib/cjs' && esbuild `find lib/transformed -type f -name "*.ts"` --platform='node' --ignore-annotations --format='esm' --outdir='lib/esm' && cp -r src/dashboard/index.html lib/cjs/dashboard/index.html && cp -r src/dashboard/index.html lib/esm/dashboard/index.html && cp package.json lib/cjs/pckg.json && cp package.json lib/esm/pckg.json && rm -rf lib/transformed
scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs src/index.ts && chmod -R a+rw docs

author: 0x4096 (Robert Jansen)
